welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sempeter pri Gorici, Slovenia! Get ready to experience the charm of this picturesque town known for its rich history and beautiful nature. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Sempeter has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronchi Dei Legionari Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Airfield Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.
